DOC.brief_summary: To analyze effectiveness mat Pilates compare intervention individual chronic nonspecific low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Mat Pilates Exercises Individuals With Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: There evidence exercise base Pilates method reduce pain chronic nonspecific low back pain ( CNLBP ) . However , notice lack study compare effectiveness mat Pilates intervention treatment individual CNLBP . Therefore , main objective study analyze effectiveness mat Pilates compare intervention patient chronic nonspecific low back pain . It randomize control trial two arm double blind ( caregiver , assessor outcome assessor ) , compose 30 patient , age 18- 65 year ( Â±22,47 ) sex , diagnose chronic non-specific low back pain persist three month pain intensity great 3 point Pain Numerical Rating Scale . The participant randomly divide two group : Pilates Group ( n = 15 ) , intervention base mat Pilates exercise , Control Group ( n =15 ) intervention . The mat Pilates group perform 16 session , twice week 60-minute duration throughout eight week , whereas control group participant keep usual care end intervention . Both group evaluate program researcher unaware patient ' allocation . The primary assessed outcome : pain intensity ( Pain numerical rating scale , McGill questionnaire ) , quality life ( SF-36 ) , disability ( Oswestry Low Back Pain Disability Questionnaire ) . In addition , strength muscle activation transverse abdominal secondary outcome assess Stabilizer Pressure Biofeedback Unit test . As result , study infers mat Pilates exercise significantly improve evaluate outcome . Thus , support clinical decision treatment chronic nonspecific low back pain .
DOC.criteria: Complaining nonspecific low back pain three month without radicular symptom period exceed 12 month . Pain intensity equal 3 point evaluate Pain Numerical Rating Scale last seven day . Eligibility practice physical activity respond Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire PARQ Degenerative inflammatory pathology spine , Acute crisis pain shoulder , knee , ankle spine Spinal tumor Recent surgery spine , low upper limb Herniated disc Spondylolysis spondylolisthesis Rheumatologic diseases Patients labor dispute In treatment involve Pilates , physiotherapy medication .
